title: Fps stuck at 60
body:
Hi,

Sinds yesterday my fps is stuck at 60 fps. When the game starts its goes like half a second to 240 (which is my original fps) and immediatly drops to 60 fps. My specs are Intel Core I5 7th and Nvidia Geforce GTX. Can someone please help me? I tried putting my settings on the lowest, still stuck on 60. My nvidia is up to date, the thing with the fullscreen didnt work to.

replies.body: go to nvidia control panel and disable vsync.  also go to settings video in game and make it uncapped. and disable vsync from league video settings as well.

^ This should be able to help a bit. I'd also recommend going into your Nvidia settings and disabling G-sync if your card supports it. G-Sync and leagues V-sync have been known to cause problems with each other.
